xmp_schema.label: Data schema for Nemateria
xmp_schema.description: Set Dublin Core data for Nemateria

xmp_property.name: title
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBTitle=Title
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBTitleDescription=Document's title (original or attributed)

xmp_property.name: creator
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBCreator=Creator
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBCreatorDescription='SURNAME firstname (role)' for each author. If many, add a comma ',' between them. Do not add moral persons.

xmp_property.name: subject
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBSubject=Keywords
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBSubjectDescription=Keywords for each collection (not a thesaurus) unless different choice of media library (Rameau for example). List with values separated by commas ','

xmp_property.name: description
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBDescription=Description
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBDescriptionDescription=Free description.

xmp_property.name: publisher
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBPublisher=Publisher description
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBPublisherDescription=SURNAME firstname.

xmp_property.name: contributor
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBContributor=Contributors or curators
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBContributorDescription=Informations on contributors or curators if useful.

xmp_property.name: date
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBDate=Date
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBDateDescription=Creation date of the document (uselly the historical date).

xmp_property.name: type
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBType=Type
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBTypeDescription=Nature or genre of the resource (categories, functions, general genres, content aggregation levels).

xmp_property.name: format
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBFormat=Format
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBFormatDescription=Physical or digital manifestation of the resource.

xmp_property.name: identifier
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBIdentifier=Identifier
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBIdentifierDescription=Unique reference to the resource in a given context (URI, ISBN).

xmp_property.name: source
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBSource=Source
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBSourceDescription=Reference to a resource from which the described resource is derived (URI).

xmp_property.name: language
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBLanguage=Language
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBLanguageDescription=Language of the intellectual content of the resource.

xmp_property.name: relation
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBRelation=Relation
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBRelationDescription=Reference to a related or linked resource.

xmp_property.name: coverage
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBCoverage=Coverage
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBCoverageDescription=Format of the digital master (ex. 50 million pixel RGB TIFF file).

xmp_property.name: rights
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBRights=Rights
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DBRightsDescription=Information on the rights associated with the resource (IPR, copyright, licence, etc.)

xmp_property.name: id
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DocID=Unique identifier
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DocIDDescription=Unique identifier of the document (refer to the documentation).

xmp_property.name: original_reference
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DocRef=Reference to original
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DocRefDescription=Previous reference in intial information system.

xmp_property.name: original_file
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DocOriginalRef=Original file
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DocOriginalDescription=Name of the original document.

xmp_property.name: original_creation_date
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DocCreation=Original's creation date
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DocCreationDescription=Creation date of the original (historical).

xmp_property.name: original_support_type
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DocSupport=Type of the original support
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DocSupportDescription=Type of the original (ex. Photo on glass / Cinema film 1 h 23 min / book 326 pages).

xmp_property.name: curator_file
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DocCarac=Curator of the document
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DocCaracDescription=The name of the curator of the document.

xmp_property.name: rights_holders
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DocMaster=Who holds the rights
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DocMasterDescription=Format of the numeric master (ex. 50 million pixel RGB TIFF file).

xmp_property.name: numerisation_date
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DocDateNum=Numerisation date
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DocDateNumDescription=Numerisation date of the document.

xmp_property.name: access_conditions
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DocAccessibilite=Access conditions
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DocAccessibiliteDescription=Define the conditions to access to the document. You can choose numbers separated by comma or describe the conditions (cf. documentation)

xmp_property.name: attendees
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/Participants=Attendees and roles
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/ParticipantsDescription=SURNAME firstname (role) (separate attendees by commas).

xmp_property.name: publisher_online
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/PartEditeur=Online publisher
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/PartEditeurDescription=Who hold the online collection.

xmp_property.name: publisher_source_oeuvre
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/PartEditeurSource=Publisher of the source oeuvre
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/PartEditeurSourceDescription=Company name, head office (companies could be separated by commas).

xmp_property.name: producers
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/PartProducteur=Partners and producers
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/PartProducteurDescription=Company name (role) ; or SURNAME firstname (role) (producers could be separated by commas).

xmp_property.name: copyright
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DroitsCopyright=Document's copyright
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DroitsCopyrightDescription=Licence type and rights explanation.

xmp_property.name: url_licence
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DroitsUrlLicence=Link to licence
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/DroitsUrlLicenceDescription=A link to an external licence page explanation.

xmp_property.name: latitude
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/LocLatitude=Latitude
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/LocLatitueDescription=Latitude of document to show on map

xmp_property.name: longitude
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/LocLongitude=Longitude
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/LocLongitudeDescription=Longitude to show on map

xmp_property.name: where_subject
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/LocWhereSubject=Subject location
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/LocWherSubjectDescription=Location of the subject treated.

xmp_property.name: where_digit
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/LocWhereDigit=Where digitized
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/LocWhereDigitDescription=Where was been digitized.

xmp_property.name: where_preserv
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/LocWherePreserve=Where preserved
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/LocWherePreserveDescription=Where document is preserved.

xmp_property.name: informants
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/Informateur=Informants(s)
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/InformateursDescription=SURNAME Firstname (informants could be separated by commas).

xmp_property.name: informants_alias
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/InforAlias=Alias or pseudonym of the informants
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/InforAliasDescription=List of alias or pseudonyms of informants (could be separated by commas)

xmp_property.name: informants_birthday
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/InforNaissance=Birthdays of informants
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/InforNaissanceDescription=Liste des dates de naissance des informateurs.

xmp_property.name: informants_skills
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/InforCompetence=Skills of informants
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/InforCompetenceDescription=List of skills (separate skills with space and informants skills by commas).

xmp_property.name: collection_name
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/ColNom=Collection's name
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/ColDescription=The name of the numerical collection the document is part of (Warning ! Must be exactly the same for all documents of this collection).

xmp_property.name: set_name
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/SetNom=Set's name
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/SetDescription=The name of the numerical set the document is part of (Warning ! Must be exactly the same for all documents of this set).

xmp_property.name: collection_infos
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/ColInfos=Collection's name
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/ColInfosDescription=Description of the collection.

xmp_property.name: who_scans
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/ColNumerisation=Who digitized
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/ColNumDescription=Precise who scans the documents.

xmp_property.name: original_owner
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/ColProprietaire=Original's document owner
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/ColProprietaireDescription=Precise the name of the original's document owner.

xmp_property.name: originals_curator
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/ColOriginaux=Conservateur originaux
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/ColOriginauxDescription=Indicate who keeps the files.

xmp_property.name: rights_holder
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/ColDetenteur=Rights owner
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/ColDetenteurDescription=Specify who owns the rights to the collection and/or file.

xmp_property.name: collection_manager
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/ColGest=Collection's manager
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/ColGestDescription=Name of collection's manager.

xmp_property.name: collection_location
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/ColLoc=Collection location
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/ColLocDescription=What places does the collection originate from or show of.

xmp_property.name: series
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/Serie=Is par of the series
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/SerieDescription=A simple name (one or two words).

xmp_property.name: series_parent
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/SerieParent=Parent series
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/SerieParentDescription=The series has a parent ? (create a hierarchy)

xmp_property.name: series_order
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/SerieOrdre=Order in the series
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/OrdreDescription=Give a number to order the media in the series.

xmp_property.name: sequences
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/Sequence=Number of the sequence
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/SeqDescription=List of sequences or marks in media.

xmp_property.name: time_codes
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/TimeCode=List of 'time codes'
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/SeqTimeCodeDescription=List of start time codes of sequences (the beginning of the time code for each sequence).

xmp_property.name: sequences_durations
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/seqDuree=Durations
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/SeqDureeDescription=List of durations of sequences.

xmp_property.name: sequences_resumes
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/SeqResume=Short descriptions
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/SeqResumeDescription=List of short descriptions of the sequence.

xmp_property.name: sequences_keywords
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/seqMotCles=Keywords
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/SeqMotsClesDescription=List of keywords of the sequence.

xmp_property.name: events_marks
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/seqMarqueEvenement=Events or marks triggers
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/SeqMarqueEvenementDescription=List of events code to trigger (names). Take a look to the documentation for more informations.

xmp_property.name: contains_elements
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/relElements=Contain this elements
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/relElementsDescription=Elements contained in this document (separated by commas).

xmp_property.name: require_documents
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/relRequiert=Requiert ces documents
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/relRequiertDescription=Required elements for this document (separated by commas).

xmp_property.name: links_internal_documents
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/relInternes=Links inside collections
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/relInternesDescription=List of internal links inside the collections (separated by commas).

xmp_property.name: links_external_documents
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/relExternes=Links to external documents
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/relExternesDescription=List of link to external document (separated by commas).

xmp_property.name: certif_type
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/certifType=Type of certification
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/certifTypeDescription=Indiquer le type de certification dont il s'agit.

xmp_property.name: certif_autority
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/certifAutorite=Certification authority
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/certifAutoriteDescription=Présenter et expliquer l'autorité qui certifie (blockchain ou organisme).

xmp_property.name: certif_hash
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/certifHash=Hash (blockchain)
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/CertifHashDescription=Hash permettant de vérifier la certification par la blockchain ou un système de certification.

xmp_property.name: certif_politic
xmp_property.label: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/certifPolitique=External link
xmp_property.description: $$$/nemateriaSchema/Property/certifPolitiqueDescription=Link and informations on certification to explain his politic and how it work.
